Title: God Where Are You?
Writer: Brooks Braswell (additional material by), Gerald Doggett (additional material by), Angela Doggett-Brown (additional material by), De Miller, Mark Miller (additional material by), Gary Upleger (additional material by)
Actors: Wade Williams, Kibwe Dorsey, David Raizor, Michael Santi
Plot: Sonny Boone was a fighter who had everything, then lost it. He blamed God for all of his troubles and asked WHY bad things happened to him? His ultimate question: God Where Are You?
